name: Roast-It Notes
description:
We all know that roommates can sometimes...  Well....   SUCK!

Passive aggressive taunts? Over-the-top To-Do lists? We know how it goes.

How often have you wanted to pick up a dirty dish and hurl it across the room just to spite the person who left it there?

Now you can.

If you're interested in knowing more about the development of Roast-it Notes or want to take a peek at some of the other stuff we have in the works, you might want to check out our blogs:

 jesselinards.wordpress.com 

rileylollback.wordpress.com

bcum.guru

Get to know the team, don't worry, we aren't too ugly:
